fullplot: A drama based on an alleged incident in 1956 Samara, where a young woman who danced with a religious icon was frozen into immobility.
plot: A drama based on an alleged incident in 1956 Samara, where a young woman who danced with a religious icon was frozen into immobility.
title: The Miracle

tomatoes.consensus: Though it has a mean streak, and does not cater to all tastes, Observe and Report has gut-busting laughs and a fully committed Seth Rogen in irresistible form.
